cs351.core

Interface Triangle

  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface Triangle
    A triangle maintains a single float[] array representing its genes and provides some useful methods for extracting data from it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float[] getColor()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a Vector4 representing the color of this triangle.

    • Method Detail

      • getXVertices

        float[] getXVertices()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns an ordered list of vertices. No matter how many times this is called, it should always return a list ordered in the form of { vertex 1, vertex 2, vertex 3 }.
        Returns:
        ordered list of x-vertices

      • getYVertices

        float[] getYVertices()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns an ordered list of vertices. No matter how many times this is called, it should always return a list ordered in the form of { vertex 1, vertex 2, vertex 3 }.
        Returns:
        ordered list of x-vertices

      • getColor

        float[] getColor()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a Vector4 representing the color of this triangle. The x value represents red, y represents green, z represents blue and w represents the transparency value.
        Returns:
        color of the triangle

      • getGenes

        float[] getGenes()
        Deprecated. 
        An ordered list of genes for this Triangle. See slide 25 for the order that the genes should be in.
        Returns:
        ordered list of genes

      • getMaxSize

        int getMaxSize()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        maximum distance between any vertex of the triangle

      • getMinSize

        int getMinSize()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        minimum distance between any vertex of the triangle

      • setMaxSize

        void setMaxSize(int maxSize)
        Deprecated. 
        set the maximum distance between any vertex of the triangle
        Parameters:
        maxSize - maximum distance between vertices

      • setMinSize

        void setMinSize(int minSize)
        Deprecated. 
        set the maximum distance between any vertex of the triangle
        Parameters:
        minSize - minimum distance between vertices

      • init

        void init(java.util.Random numGenerator,
          GUI mainGUI)
        Deprecated. 
        Randomly generates 10 genes for this triangle. Uses passed generator for any randomization
        Parameters:
        numGenerator - random number generator to use
        mainGUI - GUI reference for callbacks
